Name: clk_division
Description: The SPI sclk is generated internally by using a clock divider. The divider can be parameterized by the R5 processor. Clock divider 1 set the SPI SCK to 50Mhz. Divider 2 to 25Mhz. Divider 3 to 16.6Mhz and so on. The SPI SCK frequency will be given by: IP-Core clk frequency / (2 up (clock divider)).
